Ty še spamataj, sme tu prišli ťa docahnuc nazad domu a ne ti chlopoch nosic do ľesa. Migaj takoj domu, bo ce inač za ušiska docahnem domu. 
\n<Pavol>

Och... teda dobre… pôjdem, ale prosím, len priveďte Matúša, musím ho vidieť. Sa potom vrátim domov so zvesenými ušami, sľubujem. 
\n<Anička>

Ajh, znaš co? Dobre. Idzeme ci najsc teho Matúša. 
\n<Pavol>

Buďte zdrááávi, pánové, já su tady přiženenej vod Moravy. To se jděte poptat tamdle Aničkinych rodičů, její fotr se mi stěžoval, že prý se jim dceruška, taková tichá šikovná dívenka, dala do spolku s těma hovadama, chudák její mať voči nadobro vybřečela. 
\n<Dedinčan>

Diki, ale už znam o nich. V dzedzine pri mosce byvaju.
\n<Pavol>

Pojďte!
\n<Dedinčan>
No, čo máte nové? Kde je môj milý? \n<Anička>
Tvoj mily je bars mily, ale na dakeho ineho. Tu smotri na obrazčok, i znamienko do detailu Macej nakrešlil, kebys neverila svatemu. \n<Pavol>

Och moj Božeeee… Prečooo? Ja sa zabijem! S Tomašom! Ja som to tušila!
\n<Anička>
Boha! Boha, Maceji, rob coška! Takoj! Ja nemožem v totych bľachoch nič! \n<Pavol>
Hej? Ta migaj ho postaviť naspak, bo inač ce dobijem jak koňa. \n<Pavol>
Jojh, pan veľkomožny, nehnevajce se! Užaj nanosime desky naspak. \n<Somrák>

Dobrý deň sa praje. Zemepán i richtár nás poverili vyšetrovať sektu, čo sa tu usadila. Vraj vaša dcéra o tom niečo vie.
\n<Matej>

Gutntag, damnundher, majne name ist Ludwig Pallmer. Ale nebojte sa, to je všetko, čo viem po nemecky, starý dedo sa sem z Bavorska priženil. Nuž, Anička sa nám odcudzila, domov skoro nechodí a včera sme po nej ziapali aj bitku dostala. Ráno nebola v posteli. Nevieme, či sa vôbec vráti.
\n<Pallmer>

Dajte denník, ja viem čítať. Žiadne strachy, vám ju domov privedieme.
\n<Matej>

Mno. Celkom pekné písmo...
\n<Matej>

"Začiatok leta roku Pána 1451. Asi milujem M. Spravím to preňho. Pridám sa k Zurvanistom." \!
Hm, pridala sa ku kultu... pohľadám súčastný dátum... \n

"Odídem, toto už nezvládam. Drahý denník, obetujem preňho všetko, pobalím sa, v noci sa vykradnem a počkám ho pri útese. Ach, môj drahý M., snáď mi sinky pofúkaš…"
Ideme! \n
Felčiarom som tu. Ratujem ľudi keď treba. Bylinki zbieram pre chorych a tak.\n<Felčiar>
Aj mňa porichtuješ jak by trebalo?\n<Pavol>

cmds.original: Jak sa na stary hrad dostanem.
cmds.translation: How dost I journey to yon old castle?

cmds.original: jak sa na stary hrad dostanem.
cmds.translation: How dost I journey to yon old castle?

cmds.original: Len neznam, jak do staryho hradu sa dostanem.
cmds.translation: I just know not how to reach the old castle.
Let us be on our way.
Enjoy it heartily (hand him a bottle).
I shall not refuse yer coin.
Hast ye laid thine eyes upon the monk?
Here ye hast, ye rascals (-20 coin).

cmds.original: Nee nee, len mi povedz kde presne toten posol čaka.
cmds.translation: Nay, nay, but tell me where exactly the messenger doth await.
Where may we find the herbs?

cmds.original: Skadzi mam znac kde suchare skryvaš?
cmds.translation: How am I to discern the whereabouts of ye biscuits?
We shall be on our way.

cmds.original: Kde tu prosim ťa bylinkara zoženieme?
cmds.translation: Where can we meet the herbalist in here?

cmds.original: Von z hradu jak sa dostanem?
cmds.translation: How dost I make my way out of the castle?

cmds.original: Nee len nam povidz, dze richtar byva presne.
cmds.translation: Nay, just tell us where exactly the burgmaster lives.
You shall receive a beating, knave.

cmds.original: Idzem sa umyc, už še nejeduj.
cmds.translation: I'll go bathe, don't be so cross with me.
We have other matters to attend to.

cmds.original: Račej dačo zajimave mi povidz ešte.
cmds.translation: Rather, tell me something of interest.
Hither, take some coin for ale (- 20 crowns).
Throw the petard into the well.
Let us discourse regarding the Jew
Just remind me of the password.

cmds.original: Hmmm... ta to še mi pozdava calkom.
cmds.translation: Hmm... your proposal appeals to me well.

cmds.original: Uhni len, idem len pozreť, či vinko dobre tu neni.
cmds.translation: Step aside. I only wish to see if wine is stored here.
Once only, I shall taste and that's it.

cmds.original: Nejeduj sa. Si len srandu z cebe robim.
cmds.translation: Do not fret. I jest with thee.
I will return some other time.
The lord sent us for some herbs.

cmds.original: Dajaka klebeta sa nedostala k tebe?

cmds.translation: Let me tell you about the Jew.

cmds.original: Nebuj še nič, paru ožratych čehúňov dám dole, i keď som pod parou.
cmds.translation: I can best a couple of drunken boors, even if somewhat inebriated myself.

cmds.original: Privolim ti, treba to vydumac. Totych husitoch fakt nedame dvojo.
cmds.translation: Aye, it must be thought out. We cannot best these Hussites in a pair.
Better not, perhaps. Let us think of something.
Mayhap 'tis bettre to pursue another course of action.

cmds.original: Ešte mi povidz, kto to financuje cale.
cmds.translation: Tell me, who is funding all of this.

cmds.original: Co chce toten vaš kult dosiahnuť vlastne.
cmds.translation: What is the aim of ye cult, in truth?
Let us be off now, to retrieve that painting.
We don't have anything for ye, old man.

cmds.original: Fuj jaky kentus tam, neham to tam
Čomu v tvojej družine bola potvora?
cmds.translation: Why did you have a cursed beast among your colleagues?

cmds.original: Čo ste tu v kraji porábali?
cmds.translation: What were ye doing in these parts?
Who is behind the distribution of qahwah?

cmds.original: Čo v starom hrade robil Turek?
cmds.translation: What was the Turk doing in the old castle?
Tell us of Ahriman and Zurvan.
And what of the conjuress Pauli?

cmds.original: Zaútočme na nich cez tajnú chodbu!
cmds.translation: Attack them through their secret passage!
We shall journey to Ignác to present Bohdan's... 'tattoo'.
Very well, I shall take my leave then.
Offer the hen the dark bean.

cmds.original: Nič, nech ti Boh žehna, dovidenia.

cmds.translation: Enjoy it heartily (hand him a bottle).
I will not scorn your coins.

cmds.original: Ľen neznam, jak do staryho hradu sa dostanem.
cmds.translation: I know not what way leads to yon old castle.
Yes, just remind me of it.

cmds.original: Uhni, ľen idzem pozrec, či vinko dobre tu neni.
cmds.translation: Step aside, I just want to inquire whether wine is stored here.
What sort of place is this?
Let us discourse regarding the Jew.
Here, see this, petard. I'll set it up there.

cmds.original: Pekne tu buď, dosť už si krk nastavovala.
cmds.translation: Stay here nicely. Ye hast risked ye neck enough.
Well, give it a try, then.
Off to the rack with ye.
How art thou bound to the cult?
Why were thee rhyming in the tavern?

cmds.original: Kto bol ten Turek, čo sa udusil?
cmds.translation: Who was that Turk who choked?

cmds.original: Co chce toten vaš kult dosahnuc vlastne.
cmds.translation: What is the aim of ye cult, in truth?
Art ye the mastermind behind it all, Root?
And what features dost this Bohdan posses?

cmds.original: Skadzik mace peňeži na taku vilku?
cmds.translation: Whence dost ye gather such riches for ye estate?

cmds.original: To je sice pekne ale vobec ma to nezajima.
cmds.translation: 'Tis a noble deed, but it concerns me naught.

cmds.original: Skadzi mam znac, dze suchare skryvaš?
cmds.translation: How am I to discern the whereabouts of ye biscuits?
You are right, let's go sleep.

cmds.original: Jakto, že na tvoj hrad Husiti neútočia?
cmds.translation: How come Hussites don't attack yer castle.

terms.translation: Lord save us, we cannot escape!

customItems.translation: Very well. What can you sell?

customItems.original: Dajaka klebeta sa nedostala k tebe?
Ahriman! Sem poď! Na moju stranu! \n<Marek>
Prosím, prosím nieee! Vzdávam sa! Vzdávam sa! Aaajh! \n<Vecheť>
customItems.translation: Please, please noo! I yield, I yield, aah!\n<Dick>

customItems.original:
\c[14]5 korún\c[0] sme získali!\!
\c[14]Zviazaný kultista\c[0] teraz patrí nám.
customItems.translation:
\c[14]5 coins\c[0] are now ours!\!
\c[14]Bound cultist\c[0] now belongs to us!

Actors.originalProfile: Veterán z križiackej výpravy proti Turkom na Balkáne.
Actors.translatedProfile: Veteran from a crusade against the Turks in Balkan.
Renowned inquisitor. Tied up many criminals.

Actors.originalProfile: Gluptak zglupeny. Div, že na nohách stojí.
Actors.translatedProfile: Drowned in booze. It's a wonder he is still standing.
Warrior in the service of the lord.
Warrior in the service of the lord.

Actors.originalProfile: Núdza z ľudí lotrov činí, a vlky ženie z lesa hlad.
Actors.translatedProfile:
Necessity makes men vicious, 
as hunger drives wolves from the woods.

Skills.originalDescription: Pred mocným útok nepriateľa uchráň sa!
Skills.translatedDescription: Shield yourself from powerful attacks of your foes!

Skills.originalDescription:
Široké seknutie, nejedného nepriateľa zasiahne.
Nebarz dobré proti zbroji.
Skills.translatedDescription: Broad attack, can target many enemies.

Skills.originalDescription:
Najnovšia technológia, žiaden nepriateľ proti nej neobstojí.
Po výstrele treba jedno kolo nabíjať.
Skills.translatedDescription: Latest technology, no enemy will withstands it's might.
No need in piercing the armor when you can crush the man inside it.

Skills.originalDescription:
Mierený útok do slabín zbroje.
Znižuje obranu nepriateľa.
Skills.translatedDescription:
A precise attack targeting the weakspots of the armour.
Drastically reduces opponent's armor.

Skills.originalDescription:
Decimuje morálku nepriateľov.
Znižuje útok i obranu.
Skills.translatedDescription: Lowers attack and defense of enemies.

Skills.originalDescription:
Možno vydesí nepriateľov.
Vydesení nepriatelia sú neaktívny, až kým ich nezraníš.
Skills.translatedDescription:
May scare enemies.
Affected enemies are inactive until damaged.
Will rid you of all ailments.
Removes all buffs from the enemy.

Skills.originalDescription: Oslepí, keď sa do očka strafí.
Skills.translatedDescription: High chance to blind the enemy.

Skills.originalDescription:
Mocný útok, nepriateľia horia.
Možno aj ich oslepí všetok ten oheň.
Skills.translatedDescription:
Powerful attack that sets enemies on fire.
May even blind the enemy.

Items.originalDescription: Delikátny nápoj ozdravujúceho charakteru.
Items.translatedDescription: Delicate drink of healing properties.

Items.originalDescription:
Doplňuje zásoby. Nemožno použiť počas boja. 
Munícia, náhradné nity, remene, svätená voda.
Items.translatedDescription: Restocks tools. Cannot be used during combat.

Items.originalDescription:
Odstráni všetky neduhy. Krvácanie, hlavybôľ, mrákoty; 
všetko zaženie. Zavše tiež posilní.
Items.translatedDescription: It removes all ailments. Bleeding, headaches, etc.

Items.originalDescription:
Postaví na nohy aj mŕtveho. Drahocenná tekutina. 
Slúži k oživeniu druha.
Items.translatedDescription: Can raise the dead. Precious liquid.

Items.originalDescription: Kľúč, ktohovie od jakej zámky.
Items.translatedDescription: A key, God knows for what lock.

Items.originalDescription: Chyža stojí pred hradom.
Items.translatedDescription: The cottage stands in front of the castle.

Items.originalDescription: Kľúč od zbrojnice pod farou.
Items.translatedDescription: Leads to armory under the church.

Items.originalDescription:
Poživeň pre mocného mládenca.
+1 útok navždy.
Items.translatedDescription:
Food for a mighty man.
+1 attack permanently.

Items.originalDescription: Strhol si jej ju, než ťa dobila potvora.
Items.translatedDescription:
You grabbed it from the thief, before you
were knocked out.

Items.originalDescription: Od veže pri nevestinci.
Items.translatedDescription: From the tower near bathouse.

Items.originalDescription:
Zemepán ti zveril túto listinu. 
Dostať sa musí do rúk richtára.
Items.translatedDescription:
Letter the lord gave you.
It must reach burgmaster in the town.

Items.originalDescription:
Ovocie z južných krajov Uhorska. 
+1 do zásob navždy.
Items.translatedDescription:
Sweet fruit from the south.
+1 tools permanently.

Items.originalDescription: Výbušnina.
Items.translatedDescription: Does what you would expect it to do.

Items.originalDescription: Čudesné osmažené kôstky.
Items.translatedDescription: Brown roasted beans.

Items.originalDescription: Sušené bylinky od felčiara.
Items.translatedDescription: Dried herbs from the herbalist.

Items.originalDescription: Čerstvé sucháre. Tvrdé, že by sa dalo s nimi klince zabíjať.
Items.translatedDescription: Fresh from the oven.

Items.originalDescription: Bodľač, vytrhnutá zo zeme i s koreňami.
Items.translatedDescription: Plucked in anger from the ground.

Items.originalDescription: Obnoví zásoby aj počas boja!
Items.translatedDescription: Will replenish tools even during a battle!

Items.originalDescription:
Svätá voda. +1 útok +1 zásoby +7 života navždy.
Dočasne pridá mnoho života.
Items.translatedDescription:
Holy water. Adds a temporary life bonus.
Also adds +1 attack +1 tools +7 life permanently.

Items.originalDescription:
Nebolo chlapa, čo by nad pálinkou vyhral.
+5 života na furt.
Items.translatedDescription:
No man won a battle against moonshine.
+5 Life permanently.

Items.originalDescription: Vecheť, doviazal si ho riadne. Už sa nepohne.
Items.translatedDescription: Dick, extremely tied up. He won't be able to budge.

Items.originalDescription:
Drevoryt zobrazujúci nečestné aktivity.
Toto nie je pohľad pre správneho kresťana.
Items.translatedDescription: This is no sight for a rightful christian.

Items.originalDescription: Okrem otvoru na nohu ma dieru i na špičke a päte.
Items.translatedDescription: Worn out shoe.

Items.originalDescription: Koža stiahnutá z pravej polky Bohdanovo zadku.
Items.translatedDescription: Skin from Bohdan's right buttcheek.

Items.originalDescription: Drahocenný šperk.
Items.translatedDescription: Must have costed a fortune.

Items.originalDescription:
Nápoj hodný zbojníckeho kapitána.
Pľuje oheň. Môže ti spôsobiť dočasnú slepotu.
Items.translatedDescription:
Drink worthy of highwayman captain.
Spits fire. May cause you temporary blindness.

Items.originalDescription: Pán Stein Stein, treba ho odviesť domov.
Items.translatedDescription: Mister Stein Stein, we must bring him home.

Items.originalDescription: Vyrvané z hrude príšeri, ktorou kedysi býval Janči.
Items.translatedDescription: Ripped out from the beast that used to be Janči.

Items.originalDescription: Chudák, donesme ho domov.
Items.translatedDescription: Poor sod. Let's bring him home.

Items.originalDescription: Hasan Bey, sultánov agent.
Items.translatedDescription: Hasan Bey, agent of the sultan.

Items.originalDescription: Ucho husitu.
Items.translatedDescription: Ear of a Hussite.

Items.originalDescription:
Nádherný obraz zachycuje prostredie tohoto kraja. 
Jak živy.
Items.translatedDescription: Beautiful picture of this land.

WeaponItems.originalDescription:
Horí ohňnom spravodlivosti.
Sním vstúpime do nebeského kráľovstva.
WeaponItems.translatedDescription:
Burns with flames of righteousness.
With it we may enter the kingdom of heaven.

WeaponItems.originalDescription: Kto by sním sekol, duša by mu zhnila.
WeaponItems.translatedDescription:
The soul of the user would rot.
Can not be equiped.

ArmorItems.originalDescription: Možno použiť fintu dzig do hlavy.

Veľký štít.
Možno použiť fintu dzig do hlavy.

Medený drôt zakrútený do tvaru prsteňa.
Zvyšuje šancu na úhyb.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
Copper wire shaped into a circle.
Increases evasion rate.

ArmorItems.originalDescription: Táto helma dávno nie je v móde. Predsa, nájdu sa taký čo ju využívajú.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription: Old type of helmet. Can be still useful.

ArmorItems.originalDescription:
Najmodernejšia zbraň.
Možno použiť fintu strela.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
Latest gunpowder weapon.
Can perform gunshot.

Hunting sort.
Can perform bow shot.

ArmorItems.originalDescription: Ani v zbroji nie je človek v bezpečí proti tejto zbrani.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
Even knights feel uneasy around this weapon.
Can perform crossbow shot.

ArmorItems.originalDescription:
Širokánsky zlatý prsteň.
Keď ním otočíš, zbaví ťa neduhov.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
Massive golden ring.
Can perform Purge.

ArmorItems.originalDescription:
Táto zbroj je z dielne ozajstného majstra.
Nemožno omráčiť toho, kto má takú na sebe.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
This is a work of a master craftsman!
Its user can not be stunned.

ArmorItems.originalDescription:
Táto helma je z dielne ozajstného majstra.
Nemožno oslepiť toho, kto ju nosí.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
This is a work of a master craftsman!
Its user can not be blinded.

ArmorItems.originalDescription:
Nemožno krvácať človeku, čo drží tento štít.
Možno použiť fintu dzig do hlavy.
ArmorItems.translatedDescription:
Big, oblong shield.
Its user can not bleed.
